name: THE LIVID RIVALS - "HOOD" TEE
description: Mens - T-Shirt • 100% COTTON • Colors: BLACK/WHITE • Sizes: S-2XL This item comes with an official WAR® Logo sticker. BEFORE YOU PURCHASE Double check your order to make sure you filled out everything correctly, and ordered the correct size and item. When washing, we recommend that you flip your shirt inside out, wash cold, and hang dry. STILL UNSURE? Please contact us through our fan page, twitter, or e-mail. We are happy to answer all of your sizing & ordering questions. Need to talk to someone? Give the WAR Store a call (310) 880-6975. RETURNS Grab the wrong size? Worried you might have? Don't hesitate to let us know your concerns. SHIPMENTS Please allow 2-5 business days for all items purchased within the U.S. All items are shipped priority through USPS, & will also come with a tracking number once shipped.
